amendment.description: To provide funding for, and extend the termination date of, the Commission on the Abraham Lincoln Study Abroad Fellowship Program, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3667 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3667 proposed by Senator Campbell for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9423; text: CR S9423) To provide funding for, and extend the termination date of, the Commission on the Abraham Lincoln Study Abroad Fellowship Program, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3667 proposed by Senator Campbell for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3667 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
